short.ar: صندوق أدوات مليء بأدوات العمل لواتساب ويب.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: A toolbox full of business tools for WhatsApp Web.
short.es: Una caja de herramientas llena de herramientas empresariales para WhatsApp Web.
short.fr: Une boîte à outils pleine d'outils d'affaires pour WhatsApp Web.

short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Uma caixa de ferramentas cheia de ferramentas de negócios para o WhatsApp Web.
short.tr: WhatsApp Web için iş araçları dolu bir araç kutusu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disclaimer: This extension is not affiliated with, associated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by WhatsApp or its parent company. WhatsApp is a registered trademark of WhatsApp LLC.
